title: Mei HaShiloach

titles.text: For Shabbat Chanuka and Rosh Chodesh

nodes.title: For Shabbat Chanuka and Rosh Chodesh
nodes.key: For Shabbat Chanuka and Rosh Chodesh

enDesc: A famous collection of Rabbi Mordechai Leiner's thoughts and sermons on the weekly parsha, on holidays and on various other texts, they were gathered by his grandson. Some of the unconventional observations about personal struggle and the practice of halakha in this book have elicited renewed interest in the last several decades.
enShortDesc: Popular collection of teachings of the Izhbitzer on the weekly Torah portion and holidays, published by his grandson, Rabbi Gershon Leiner.
heShortDesc: אוסף דרשותיו של האישביצר העוסקות בפרשות השבוע ובחגים, והוציא לאור נכדו הרב גרשון ליינר.

dedication.en: Dedicated with affection by Aryeh and Raquel Rubin in honor of three physicians with extraordinary neshamot – Drs. Jeffrey Dach, Elliot Heller and Lawrence Reiss.
dedication.he: מוקדש בחיבה על-ידי אריה ורקל רובין לכבודם של שלושה רופאים עם נשמה יוצאת דופן - ד"ר ג'פרי דך, ד"ר אליוט הלר וד"ר לורנס רייס.
